job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
Amify is a two-time Inc 500 award winner Amazon-as-a-Service (AaaS) provider that offers brands an end-to-end Amazon solution that maximizes sales and profitability. Amify’s data-driven, full-service solution includes strategy, advertising, creative, management and operations for brand protection, content enhancement, sales acceleration and inventory management. We are uniquely positioned to help our brands achieve greater sales margins through the Amazon ecommerce platform. Amify has partnered with over 1,000 brands of all sizes to manage over $100 million in sales on Amazon.
We are seeking a Software Engineer who will contribute to the delivery of a wide variety of software projects across Amify’s entire technology stack, from operational systems such as Salesforce, to database and reporting platforms, and custom-built web apps and services.
Responsibilities
Deliver high-quality, architecturally sound code extending and building upon Amify’s current technology
Work to extend and leverage Amify’s technology stack, including Snowflake, AWS, Fivetran, dbt and Looker
Deliver solutions large and small across a wide range of projects and initiatives
Participate in architecture, coding, and delivery of developed systems
Participate in iterative interaction with customers, from pre-coding requirements to post-delivery feedback
Technical Requirements
Demonstrated skill delivering software on deadlines
Demonstrated skill in at least one enterprise programming language such as C, C++, JavaScript/node.js, Java, Python, C#, Rust, Go, Scala, Clojure, etc.
Demonstrated skill in at least one scripting language such as JavaScript, Unix shell/bash/zsh/etc, Python, PL/SQL, or similar.
Fluent in software engineering lifecycle and knows how to implement and apply principles to a wide range of problem spaces
Demonstrated skill in SQL and enterprise-capable databases, e.g. Snowflake,
Postgres, Oracle, MySQL
Qualifications
3+ years of relevant professional experience
2+ years cloud software engineering experience
Proven delivery experience on a multi-functional team delivering web, mobile, distributed, enterprise business applications
Willingness to work cross-functionally in a vibrant, dynamic startup environment
Trustworthy, Team-Oriented, Transparent
Excellent written and verbal skills
What You’ll Get Out Of It
Enjoy a fun, fast-growing entrepreneurial company
Be part of a highly collaborative learning culture- share knowledge, be inclusive, learn and grow together. Embrace teamwork!
Knowing your ideas are heard and matter. Think big!
You get to own your job and be recognized for your contributions
Work with smart and creative people
We want all the experience and expertise you have to offer, but we won’t burn you out. We offer unlimited PTO plus over 10 holidays
It’s okay to make mistakes because we’re human. Let’s learn from them. Be transparent!
We recognize you as an individual- no presumptions or judgment. Be the extraordinary you!
Have “skin in the game” through our employee stock options plan
